website_summaries.verdict: Provide a cool, white atmosphere that mimics daylight, although some say they flicker.
pros: Four-pack of 5000K bulbs that imitate daylight at their brightest
800 lumens with life rating of 25,000 hours
Dims as well as incandescent bulbs
cons: Can't be used with a three-way dimmer switch
Some experience flickering with these bulbs, as well as early bulb failure

customer_reviews.title: These flicker noticably
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap bulbs and you get what you pay for. They flicker noticeably for up to an hour after they are turned on, whether they are connected to a dimmer or not. They also flicker when dimmed. The flicker isn't too bad, and some might not notice it, but I find it irritating. On the plus side, they dim as much as incandescents, unlike most LED bulbs which only get a little darker when fully dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: K. F.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not only so these bulbs save on energy consumption where used, but they also allow you to turn the AC temp up a bit as they don't generate any heat at all in comparison to the 800 degrees every coil bulb generates, leaving the atmosphere cooler. My only disappointment is the cost. Found a comparable 6pack at Walmart for $3.97. The cost here on Amazon was 3x that. Also, on a lamp that normally has 3 dimmable settings, this bulb seems to skip from low to high with a single touch, completely skipping the medium light setting. Not a huge deal but something I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: cucmesmile

customer_reviews.title: Low refresh rate. Dizziness and scan lines on video camera
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other led bulbs I have throughout my house, these have a very noticeably lower refresh rate. It's to the point were it's causing a tiny bit of dizziness and headaches. Easiest way to describe a low refresh rate is, if you move your hand quickly back and forth under the light it gets a strobe light / screen-door effect making any faster movement under the light disorientating. Another side affect of the low refresh rate also means any video recorded under these lights has slow moving rather large black scan lines.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Myers

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Flickering.
customer_reviews.text: I fail to see how these can be advertised as non-flickering bulbs. I know this can be affected by the type of dimmer you have, but I've used at least 3 different bulb brands now in this room and have never seen anything like this. Upon turning the lights on, there was an immediate pronounced humming sound coming from them and flickering so intense that it could make one standing beneath it feel like the prime target in a slasher flick. Anyway, this was a whole lotta nope. Returning for something better quality. Disregard the messy work space in the video, its quarantine life afterall these days.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny2127

customer_reviews.title: Worked for two days, then went dead
customer_reviews.text: I have a significant number of LED bulbs from several different manufacturers. I got these because they are brighter than average (75W equivalent, daylight) and are dimmable. I planned to place these in sockets controlled by dimmers. First off though, I placed them in sockets controlled with simple SPST switches (not dimmers.) It only took a short time (about 2 hours of ON time) for one of the bulbs to burn out. Kind of makes these EXTREMELY expensive on a per-hour of illumination basis.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Pro

customer_reviews.title: ??dimable??
customer_reviews.text: When used with my dimmer I got a strobe light show, on and off many times per second. I switched to Sylvainia LED bulbs with the same rating and they dimmed very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT 1600 lumens
customer_reviews.text: Review is for the 15W (100W Equivalent), 1600 Lumens, 4000K option: Bought these to replace 800 lumen philips hues, which my wife disliked even at full brightness. There is no way these are 2x the brightness... i'd wager around 30-40% brighter tops... similar to 1000-1200 bulbs i've purchased in the past. This is a shame because brightness was the single most important factor in my purchase -- hence the 2-star rating. If you want very bright bulbs, go elsewhere. Can't speak to longevity as i've just received them (though other reviews claim longevity isn't great). Warmth is accurate, imo -- 4000k.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Flicker severely when dimmed
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were either poorly made or defective. Both the listing and the box they are packaged in say they are dimmable, but they flicker severely (think strobe light) when dimmed even the slightest amount. Returned them immediately and will look for bulbs of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: LuluCooks

customer_reviews.title: Great dimmable LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs appear to be great quality. Pretty good dimmable range (although I'd really love bulbs that had an even lower range - near zero). The 800 lumen bulbs were brighter than I expected - brighter than a typical 60w incandescent. Great color temperature. Works well with a dimmer I used from Cloudy Bay, linked below.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: one of the globes arrived broken, test them all before installing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. As luck would have it, the 4th globe I put in didn't work. This was discovered AFTER I had climbed the ladder and replaced 3 other globes. Amazon's only option was to return all 4 globes for a refund/exchange. Which would mean spending an hour climbing the ladder and pulling down globes again. I have given the product 2 stars because the ones that work, work as promised and do work with my Lutron dimmer. Just that one of them doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: HearMeOut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fifteen years ago, who would have taken time to rate an incandescent light bulb? They were a cheap commodity back then, 2 for $1 if you found a good sale. But the LED bulbs of today cost bigger bucks, especially if you're getting the "dimmable" kind. These are very good; although I'm not sure about their longevity yet. Ask me in 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: The Bulbs are Way too Large
customer_reviews.text: I got these for an enclosed fixture, and the description says they're suitable for that, and provide a "perfect fit." However, the bulbs are much much larger than a regular A19 lightbulb and did not fit in my fixture -- they were both too long and too wide. They seem to be high quality bulbs, but the size was unacceptable, so I've had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - unsuitable for dimmers - make loud humming noise.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be used with the proper LED dimmers - sounds like a swarm of bees -:( According to my electrician the only decent LED bulbs on the market are Philips - so I'll stick with those.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: WHITE AND BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I used all four of the bulbs in outdoor sconces in the front of my home. They are the dimmable type and work perfectly with energy efficient fixtures that run at 60% power, then brighten to 100% when movement is detected. They are a bright, white light that permeates the yard around trees, down walkways and the entire front driveway area. They don’t cast any of the yellowish hue of incandescent bulbs. I definitely will be purchasing more...
customer_reviews.author: DISABLED HARLEY RIDER

customer_reviews.title: Really Bright!
customer_reviews.text: These 100w equivalent bulbs were a replacement for 60w equivalent bulbs, now much, much brighter! The only two issues that I have are: 1-The bulbs are a lot bigger than the previous 60w versions, and 2-when I turn on the switch and the dimmer is set at the lowest setting, occasionally they don't come immediately. Other than that, great purchase and we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier

customer_reviews.title: BUZZ!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed 4 of these in a ceiling fan connected to a brand new Lutron dimmer switch and the buzz was deafening. You can't cheap out on dimmable LEDs. Apparently it's very difficult (and expensive) to manufacture them correctly. Fortunately, Amazon happily accepts returns and the AmazonBasics dimmable LEDs (which are actually just rebranded Phillips bulbs) come with same-day shipping for Prime members.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, do not buy it you like good WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Horribly noisy electromagnetic radio frequency pollution. I put them in my garage door opener and it broke the radio signals to my clickers locking me out!
customer_reviews.author: miradu

customer_reviews.title: Too blue
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these because the light was too blue. I've had other 4000k bulbs (from different manufacturers) whose light I found more pleasing. Unfortunately I will be sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: McQ

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs because they are very bright and I wanted the rooms to be able to light up as much at night as they would from natural sunlight during the day. So far they’re doing the trick. I can’t attest to the lifespan as I’ve only been using them a short time, but the space is significantly brighter which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Replaced LED bulbs that were failing in the dining room. These are just as bright and have the desired warm color. No buzzing when dimming which is a big plus. Time will tell for longevity - I have found that LED bulbs in general do not meet their advertised lifetime, so fingers crossed for these bulbs from LUNO.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than Walmart
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how dim the light bulbs I got from Walmart were till I got these. What a huge difference. I only got the 40w cuz that's what my rental agreement dictates. They came package in bubble wrap and they were in tact, not a broken one. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Charli Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: These 4000K bulbs are a perfect color temperature for reading, not too warm and not too harsh. 2 of the 8 bulbs I ordered didn't work but the seller promptly replaced them. Longevity is to be determined. They work fine with a LED dimmer and have no buzzing.
customer_reviews.author: semirad

customer_reviews.title: I Love These.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. I have these in my ceiling fan on a dimmer switch. I can dim these all the way down to 0% with no buzzing or flickering. Very impressive. Usually LEDs will only dim so far then shut off, but these go all the way down. Nice light output, seems like the lumens are correct as advertised. Good color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulbs! They fit in my standard fixtures just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Bulbs! They fit in my standard fixtures just fine, even the covered ones. I like this color of light best, it's not so yellow as "soft white" but not as harsh as "daylight". They are very bright, too bright for small spaces or low fixtures, but great in areas with high ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni= )

customer_reviews.title: What a bright idea :)
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace two CFL bulbs in my garage door opener. Not only are these brighter but they are instant on. No longer need to wait until the bulbs warm up in order to get to maximum brightness. In addition, these bulbs will run cooler and cheaper. Bulbs arrived quickly and in good condition. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Favorite LED bulb I've tried
customer_reviews.text: These are bright, work perfectly with a dimmer, and the solid base extends less far up the bulb than many, leaving more room for illuminated glass to shine from more angles than straight ahead. It is very much a daylight-colored bulb, but at 5000k it isn't absurdly blue. If these bulbs last until other bulbs in my house need replacing I'll order more LUNO's.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin T. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Ghosting with Lutron Caseta switch
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in our bathroom and everything is good except ghosting occurs when Lutron Caseta switch is off. I bought the dimmable version. Maybe I should have got non-dimmable? Previously I had other bulbs that worked well so it is not the switch or wiring. My choice now is to find replacement bulbs (40W 4000K are not easy to find) or buy a Lutron capacitor probably because these bulbs don’t have a built-in capacitor like some bulbs do.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathrooms, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Nice "neutral" white color but not too cool, and not that terrible yellow you get from 2700 and 3200 bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Superior bulb compared to most.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are better than others I own. Put one in my 4 dimmable track lighting fixtures to compare with other brands at same time and they were hands down better than other brands. Smoother dimming and overall softer appearance. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: davnlis

customer_reviews.title: One Defective Bulb
customer_reviews.text: For months, I fiddled with this light assuming the fixture was broken, but after finally getting "fed up" I took it out and realized the light was defective. The others are fine. The vendor is sending 4 replacements which is very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: It's a lightbulb. It does its thing and you forget it's there.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very boring product. You put it up, it does its thing every night in a completely unremarkable way, until you forget it's there. In other words, perfect. Note: install by hand, using a gentle clockwise motion until you meet resistance from the bottom of the socket.
customer_reviews.author: glauber

customer_reviews.title: Light bulbs should be seen and not heard.
customer_reviews.text: These made a buzzing noise with my dimmer. My previous LED bulbs in that fixture did not. I heard the sound with the dimmer low, on high, and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clean white light, no buzzing, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We are using one bulb in a table lamp with an on/off switch, and one in a torchiere with a Lutron Credenza dimmer (the one that lists LED compatibility). They both have very good brightness and neutral white light. The one on the dimmer seems to also handle low settings well, down to maybe 20-25% brightness. The 4000K color temperature seems to give more effective brightness for the rated amount of light. The bulb in the torchiere is replacing a 150w incandescent, and we don't miss the old bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Good bulbs that give off a good amount of light. I like the fact that they are plastic and can be handled after the light has been on a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: To call these dimmable is not accurate. I have a dimmer that is rated for led and it is not a smooth transition. The light emitted from these bulbs is also very harsh on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Nice white light to replace the old yellow ones we had. Really brightness up the living room. We don't have a dimmable fan so I can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Tpenland

customer_reviews.title: LUNO A19 Dimmable LED Bulb, 11W (75W Equivalent), 1100 Lumens, 5000K (Daylight), Medium Base (E26)
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a good purchase, the brightness is very good, easy to use. I have these installed on our backporch. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find an A 19, E 26 40 w equivalent 4000k bulb that is california compliant. I have not had the bulbs long enough to comment on the longevity, but after a diligent search, I was loosing hope that I would be able to find a bulb with the specs I wanted. I am happy with these so far.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: LED lights just like I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: My order of LUNO A19 lights arrived on time and intact. The packaging was obviously engineered to make this purchase arrive in one piece. The lights shed a nice cool, yet not overly brilliant, illumination in our newly renovated bathroom. I'd buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. HAWLEY

customer_reviews.title: Nice DIMMABLE LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Needed a dimmable replacement LED bulb for a wall sconce and these seem to fit the bill nicely at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: bikerjff

customer_reviews.title: Instant on
customer_reviews.text: The notable feature about these bulbs is that they are instant on. Other led bulbs need about half of a second to light up. I did find however, that the instant on feature may not be compatible with older style dimmer switches. In my case the bulbs would not light up at all with an old dimmer designed for use with incandescent bulbs. But, functioned properly with a new dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald yike

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I was supposed to use for a motion sensor light...
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely brighter than I anticipated. I’m using them on my porch that has a motion sensor. Lights are supposed to be at half wattage until it detects motion. Doesn’t work for me. They stay on full brightness all night.
customer_reviews.author: K Essex

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. We received our package as described and within the time promised. These bulbs are being used on our pendant lights in the kitchen and provide a dimmable option. The quality and packaging are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my life
customer_reviews.text: Now you can see really good on my side entry garage it lights up the whole driveway and I have a double wide driveway plus turn around spot.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: An improvement on our old warm white bulbs, which were always too dim and yellow for me.
customer_reviews.author: kmtchico

customer_reviews.title: Great "Offbrand"
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs bright and work. Little bit bigger bulb than previous bulb but nothing crazy.
customer_reviews.author: trey63

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a failed LED bulb and of course the original bulb was no longer available. This looked like it would work and to muy delight it was a perfect match in color and intensity. Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a light that was small but effective and it dims to a night light. Fits the bill... As for longevity, not sure have not had it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rick3Freedom

customer_reviews.title: These were the bulbs recommended by the lamp manufacteror. I broke one that came with.
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred to buy two but had to buy 4, I am old and will never use 4.
customer_reviews.author: VJH-W

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light.
customer_reviews.text: These are light bulbs. They are exactly what you think they are. If you need light bulbs buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months 😒
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with these bulbs while they lasted. The brightness is great, and we had no flickering, despite using a dimmer. Then, one burned out after only 2 months. We'll see how long the rest last.
customer_reviews.author: midwestshopper

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, bright 5000K daylight bulb. 100 watt equivalent. The right bulb to use in the kitchen if you're preparing food! Time will tell if it lasts, but I'm betting it will.
customer_reviews.author: koolkatt

customer_reviews.title: Lights give off a very blue light
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these lights. I assumed that a "neutral" color would be a good choice but the lights are very blue and unpleasant. It would be more helpful to the customer to describe them as casting a bluish light.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Luno LED Dimmable Light Bulb Worked
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with LUNO Dimmable Light Bulbs. They were compatible with my Lutron Dimmable Alexa Controlled Wall Switch and brighter than non compatible Walmart Dimmable LED bulb which would not turn off 100% when controlled by Alexa. That was good.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with my dimmers
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its my house or my dimmers but these lights never "turned off"
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is considering buying these bulbs, don't hesitate. They provide more than enough light for any room. So far, I'm very pleased with my purchase and won't hesitate to buy more if I need them.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: Wiring in lamp is correct, but the bulbs would ‘flicker’ more like an incandescent bulb might. Was consistent across all of them. Liked the light output
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Fairly bright but too white
customer_reviews.text: The 'neutral white' variety is 'whiter' than expected - not comfortable for a desk lamp. Recommend to go for the 'soft white' instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Artists use Daylight, 5000K LED Bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs provide the best brightness and color for artists and they're affordable delivered quickly. Daylight, 5000k bulbs are the best.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilber

customer_reviews.title: very nice bright light, works very well if you like bright white light
customer_reviews.text: I guess I did not think about it but as the lumens goes up the physical size of the bulb gets larger than you might expect
customer_reviews.author: DougK

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable light
customer_reviews.text: Using these in the dining room with a dimmer on the remote. They are very bright and dimming them adds a soft glow.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J

customer_reviews.title: Bright light !
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs, huge difference with these and “regular” watts. These are clean and bright daylight . Old bulbs had a yellow haze .
customer_reviews.author: AppleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great color temp for white. No blue and almost no yellow
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Not yellow but also does not have blue
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs, good price
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were used in a bath vanity light on a dimmer switch. Nice clean white light because of 4000 k , and they are dimmable. Good price for a great bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: Slightly brighter than prior standard 40 watt bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: The price seems reasonable, and I was glad to find that the bulbs fit into the socket of my prior dimmable 40 watt bulbs. The new bulbs are slightly brighter. If anything, it improves the ambiance of my kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: John Davidson

customer_reviews.title: perfect bulb
customer_reviews.text: color is just right, renders accurate color. It was good to have a color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly bright. I've used LEDs since they were introduced and most of them tend to be dim or odly colored. These are nicely bright as well as economical.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very true to the brightness
customer_reviews.text: Cost a bit for 4 bulbs but dimmable and led 100w... Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Bears

customer_reviews.title: Just not dimmable and blinks when used on a regular fixture
customer_reviews.text: Tried for sometime but was blinking out of control. Moved to a non dimmable fixture which was better but still blinking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes they flicker when dimmed
customer_reviews.text: Yes they flicker when dimmed, as others have reported. On full voltage they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jjj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light when it works
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the light bulbs that work. The problem has been that 3 of the 16 bulbs did not work when installed in the light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: DelaGator77

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but too noisy, ok for bathroom or outside
customer_reviews.author: Denis A

customer_reviews.title: They work as designed
customer_reviews.text: I like the this works in my lamps and were affordable. Just got them recently so can't address the longevity but fully expect many hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: DaTop2691

customer_reviews.title: Long life.  Use less power but still bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: results. That they last a long long time and use less electricity.
customer_reviews.author: C. STAGGS

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Correct brightness and colour. Works with my lit switches that require dimmable bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: E. Downer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: we use these in our yard lights along the sidewalks. really like led bulbs, longlasting
customer_reviews.author: O. Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Whiter than expected
customer_reviews.text: They are a little more white in color than I expected. But they are working fine. I like them dimmed more than at full.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Good light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for bulbs from Luno. I am very happy with these bulbs. The neutral white bulbs are great in my chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: snapdragon463

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wattage and color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and wattage. Definitely go with this wattage over the 60 watt and save energy, especially for indoor settings.
customer_reviews.author: Weljen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased specifically for the dimming feature for lights handing from my kitchen island. Great value vs in store. There was however a slight buzz when the dimmer function gets to a lower dim but I can only hear when i am near the lights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marzano

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, lighting up a old dark basement, using less energy and making less heat.
customer_reviews.author: David Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED QUICKLY AND AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have a nice bright cool light with no flicker so far! They dim low. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyK

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about longevity as yet. It will take a few years
customer_reviews.author: SMK-TX

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, as described, fast shipment and good communication. Would buy again and have.
customer_reviews.author: donna phibbs

customer_reviews.title: Exelent product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy how bright my room is now. It's this white light that fill the area.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lima

customer_reviews.title: Nice Daylight bulb easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I like daylight 5000K bulbs in my home. These are great
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bates

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: What a difference. Replaced incandescent clear bulbs with these in our pendant fixture. Really cuts down on the harshness. Dimmable too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nak

customer_reviews.title: Not an "instant on" bulb.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with dimmable lamps I also purchased from prime. Did not work for me in my fixture. They are not instant on so they wouldn't work with the lamps when using the switch while on a dim setting. I think they would work fine or better in a different fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Amiday

customer_reviews.title: Nice brightness for the light your used to from incandescent bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These had the lumens I couldn't find in stores. One went bad already.
customer_reviews.author: Walt S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights
customer_reviews.text: They do just as the say. They get very bright and dim well. Zero issues
customer_reviews.author: James F. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cool white light
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. I found the 4000k to be a little cool for my taste, so I'm ordering 3000k next. Can't speak to longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Toolgirl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great LED dimmable bulb
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Bulbs - they provide a warm dimmable lighting experience. The dimming was even through the range of my switch. Even dropped one of the bulbs by mistake approximately 3 feet onto a counter and it still worked perfectly. LED bulbs have come a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work really well for plants
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my orchids, they have made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Patty M Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, works perfectly with dimmer switch, pleasing color tone.
customer_reviews.author: William Raddatz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Hum
customer_reviews.text: Dimming curve was fine, but they hum badly regardless of being plugged in to a dimming or non-dimming circuit.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Bessenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED bulbs. Immediate on and bright daylight balanced output.

product_meta.title: LUNO A19 Dimmable LED Bulb, 9.5W (60W Equivalent), 800 Lumens,  5000K (Daylight), Medium Base (E26),UL & ENERGY STAR (4-Pack)
feature_bullets: ENERGY SAVINGS - 800 Lumens, Use only 9.5W (60W Equivalent) and save 84% instantly.
LONG LIFE - Last 22.8 years with life rating of 25,000 hours. Based on 3 Hours average use per day.
DIMMABLE - Dimming capabilities to your living room, dining room and bedroom for an inviting atmosphere.
PERFECT FIT - Use in table lamps, floor lamps, sconces and ceiling fixtures.
UL & ENERGY STAR Certified. 5-year Limited Warranty.
